law.catch_line: Use Of Community Mausoleum Prior To Completion; Care And Improvement Fund
law.text: No community mausoleum, crypt or structure erected as aforesaid shall be used for the purpose of depositing therein the remains of any dead body until such mausoleum, crypt or structure, or a component section thereof, is fully completed, and the permanent care and improvement fund required by section forty-three J has been established.
